name: A Fearful Dream
description:
A Fearful Dream is a horror game,story line-you are dreaming,where you are locked in a scary house.you have to find the bed to sleep and get out of this dream.Find keys to open the door.If the colour of the key and the colour of the door matches then only its the right key.

This Game will only be free for 10 Days till  25/4/2021  so hurry up fast
